name: @bt-toolkit/resource-downloader
description: Door43 Resource Downloader - Downloads and processes Door43 resources using existing adapters

scripts.start: npm run download && npm run build-db
scripts.start:app: npm run download && npm run convert-app-db && npm run create-db-asset
scripts.start:app-split: npm run download && npm run export-json-split
scripts.start:app-archive: npm run download && npm run export-archive && npm run copy-to-assets
scripts.start:app-bundled: npm run download && npm run bundle-resources

author: BT-Toolkit Team
